overview: Sagar Kasar is a Software Solutions Expert with a Decade of Experience in Software Industry. He has worked on several domains like Industrial Automation, Finance, Telecom, Internet, Energy and utilities. During his Career he has held Various positions and roles, from Product Developer, Designer to Tech Lead and from Project Engineer, Architect to Project Manager. He has worked with Top Global Companies most of them are CMMI Level 5. His Clientele includes Fortune 15 to Fortune 100.
